Name: Number of deputy commissioners in the department of investigation.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to the number of deputy commissioners in the department of investigation.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
            
	Section 1.  Section 802 of the New York city charter is amended to read as follows:
	Deputies.  The commissioner may appoint [two] three deputies, each of whom may, subject to the direction of the commissioner, conduct or preside at any investigation authorized  by this chapter.
	ï¿½ 2.  This local law shall take effect immediately.
